{"id":462110117,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1614600368,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/462110117/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.2 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        auto head=new ListNode(0);\n        auto head1=head;\n        int carry=0;\n        int sum;\n        while(l1!=nullptr || l2!=nullptr || carry!=0){\n            sum=0;\n            if(l1!=nullptr){\n                sum+=l1->val;\n                l1=l1->next;\n            }\n            if(l2!=nullptr){\n                sum+=l2->val;\n                l2=l2->next;\n            }\n            sum+=carry;\n            if(sum>=10){\n                carry=1;\n                sum-=10;\n            }\n            else{\n                carry=0;\n            }\n            auto tmp=new ListNode(sum);\n            head1->next=tmp;\n            head1=head1->next;\n        }\n        return head->next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers"}
